title: Rule-Based Learning Objective Design Course for Python Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming syntax and experience using variables, control structures, and functions
context.additional_context: Systematic advanced Python syntax training for professionals to enhance work efficiency, focusing on practical competency development through individual project applications

learning_goals: Learners can predict the execution results of complex expressions with 90% accuracy by rule-based analysis of Python expression evaluation order.
Learners can diagnose and correct errors occurring during data sharing between functions by applying variable scope rules with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can accurately explain nested call processes of three or more levels by visualizing the call stack behavior of recursive functions using a standardized visualization tool.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
